short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download this to get started on your Syntropy journey!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will allow for your chrome web browser to be connected to your Syntropy account. You will be prompted to install it following successful registration. You will be able to see user data from your web browser in your account user view.
